text:
Saturday Savings: Gigi Hadid’s Cropped Jeans Are on Sale

Alert the press: Gigi Hadid’s Nomia NYC rust-colored cropped jeans are on sale. Not only are they the perfect style (gotta love a cropped straight leg), but they also offer your…
